name: Thing Thing Collection
summary:
The Complete Collection of Thing Thing Games, as well as a few extras on the side, packed neatly in this little launcher courtesy of GameDevDan (https://forum.yoyogames.com/index.php?threads/game-launcher-create-your-own-game-packs.47236)

This includes:
Thing Thing
Thing Thing 2
Thing Thing 3
Thing Thing 4
Thing Thing Arena
Thing Thing Arena 2
Thing Thing Arena 3
Thing Thing Arena Pro
Thing Thing Arena Classic
Thing Thing 2: Alpha
Thing Thing Maker
The Thing Thing 4 Trailer
And a Guide.

The Guide is a compilation of the official ones on Crazymonkeygames.com with the Author Commentary from Newgrounds.com

You DO NOT NEED Adobe Flash to run any of these games, they come converted to .exe for your convenience.

I Also included a few images so you can add this launcher to your Steam Library, with and without hyphen, it's up to you which one is correct.

If you have the original Thing Thing Alpha or an offline version of the Thing Thing ARENA CL@$$IC H@X!! please let me know so I can add them to the collection.

All Thing Thing Content belongs to Diseased Productions Games.
Please support the official releases at /
